skills.name: Pulverize
skills.description: Strikes an enemy with a hammer and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 15% chance. If the target is under Defense reduction effects, its Attack Speed is decreased for 2 turns. The damage increases according to your Defense.
skills.level_progress_description:

Damage +5%

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Spinning Smash
skills.description: Swings the hammer, attacking all enemies and decreasing their Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to your Defense.
skills.level_progress_description:

Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Heap of Ashes
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times each, dealing damage proportionate to your Defense. Each attack has a 50% chance to reduce the target's Attack Power and block beneficial effects for 2 turns.
